text: The Baltic Bees Jet Team is a civilian aerobatic display team based in Tukums, Latvia, 60 km west of the capital, Riga. It flies six Czech Aero L-39 Albatros jets.https://www.facebook.com/events/2555125781381256/permalink/2577386452488522/ The team flies a display lasting around 20 minutes that includes formation flying, opposition passes, solo routines, and synchronized maneuvers. They fly in shows in Western Europe, Eastern Europe, Russia, as well as in China. ==References== ==External links== *Official website Category:Aerobatic teams
title: Baltic Bees Jet Team
